database.name: VIEW C_DEBT_PAYMENT_CANCEL
database.view: SELECT C_DEBT_PAYMENT_ID, AD_CLIENT_ID, AD_ORG_ID, ISACTIVE, CREATED, CREATEDBY, UPDATED, UPDATEDBY, ISRECEIPT, C_SETTLEMENT_CANCEL_ID AS C_SETTLEMENT_ID, DESCRIPTION, C_INVOICE_ID, C_BPARTNER_ID, C_CURRENCY_ID, C_CASHLINE_ID, C_BANKSTATEMENTLINE_ID, C_BANKACCOUNT_ID, C_CASHBOOK_ID, PAYMENTRULE, ISPAID, AMOUNT, WRITEOFFAMT, DATEPLANNED, ISMANUAL, ISVALID, CHANGESETTLEMENTCANCEL, CANCEL_PROCESSED, status FROM C_DEBT_PAYMENT WHERE C_SETTLEMENT_CANCEL_ID IS NOT NULL
